John Riber bụ onye India a mụrụ na Zimbabwe na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe. A maara ya nke ọma maka iduzi ihe nkiri 2000 Zimbabwe na-atọ ọchị Yellow Card
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na India
N'afọ 1977, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ihe nkiri na mahadum na United States

John na nwunye ya Louise Riber malitere ime ihe nkiri na mmepe mmepe kemgbe afọ 1979, ọkachasị na Bangladesh na India. Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 1987, ha kwagara Zimbabwe wee guzobe Media for Development Trust (MFD), otu n'ime ụlọ mmepụta na nkesa nke Africa. Ihe nkiri mbụ nke John na Louise duziri mgbe ha kwagara Zimbabwe bụ Consequences
Ihe nkiri a ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite n'emume ma bụrụ ihe egwu azụmahịa

N'afọ 2000, ọ duziri ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị Yellow Card nke Leroy Gopal na Kasamba Mkumba gosipụtara. Ihe nkiri a nwetara nyocha dị iche iche site n'aka ndị nkatọ ma mesịa gosipụta ya na ọtụtụ ememme ihe nkiri dịka Carthage Film Festival, Zanzibar International Film Festival, Southern African Film Festival na October na Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou (Fespaco).
Site na ihe ịga nke ọma ahụ, ha abụọ mere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Zimbabwe a ma ama dịka Neria, More Time na Everyone's Child
Isiokwu nke ọtụtụ n'ime ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri ncha na-adabere na nsogbu ahụike ọmụmụ na Africa.
